talk.author: did:plc:zh6dwqnf5yc3ekgth5umjak5
talk.utter: If you go to top of notification page there's a gear symbol, you can change replies to priority notifications.

talk.author: did:plc:uieo66bmcv5j4zymknj7hboz
talk.utter: Thanks for the heads up on that setting.  But that doesn't stop the rest of us from seeing the trolls reply to the accounts we follow.

talk.author: did:plc:zh6dwqnf5yc3ekgth5umjak5
talk.utter: Best way to deal with that is to subscribe to a lot of mute/block lists and moderation labelers. I have a list of a bunch of them.
